backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining game state, dialogue data, activities, moments, letters, and authorization, including transfur tracking fields and default state initialization.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old game states to a new format by adding transfur-related fields while preserving existing data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and tests for implementation tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for numerous frontend source files used for build or documentation tooling.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Guide outlining steps to diagnose and retry failed Internet Computer deployments.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining light and dark theme variables and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up the root element and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/OPS_CANISTER_AVAILABILITY.md: Operational guide for maintaining canister availability and addressing server offline issues.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing startup, navigation, backend availability, game launch logic, and diagnostics.
frontend/src/config/adminGate.ts: Defines simple local admin gate settings, specifying the admin username and derived storage key.
Defines the Activity interface and a list of activities that affect trust and may unlock moments.
frontend/src/game/audio/useAudio.ts: Provides a Zustand-based audio manager that stores volume/mute settings and controls background music playback.
frontend/src/game/characters/Puro.tsx: Renders the 3D Puro character with idle animation and handles interaction events to trigger dialogue.
frontend/src/game/controls/MobileControl: Implements touch-based movement, look, and jump controls for mobile devices with joystick and look area handling.
frontend/src/game/controls/usePlayerCont: Handles player movement and look input from keyboard and mobile controls, merging them into normalized movement output.
Zustand store that tracks joystick, look deltas, and jump requests for player control input.
frontend/src/game/customization/customiz: Defines customization items and their allowed locations for arranging objects in the environment.
Contains dialogue nodes and choices forming a branching conversation tree with trust effects and optional requirements.
frontend/src/game/enemies/types.ts: Defines enemy state structure and shared constants for movement, detection, and visuals.
frontend/src/game/enemies/WhiteLatexBeas: Implements an enemy that wanders, chases the player, and triggers capture based on distance using Three.js and game constants.
frontend/src/game/GameView.tsx: Main game view component that initializes state, renders the 3D scene, overlays HUD/UI panels, handles pause logic, and starts background music.
frontend/src/game/letters/letterTemplate: Provides sets of canned responses and selects one based on keywords in the player's letter.
frontend/src/game/minigames/BookSortingM: Interactive book-sorting minigame where correct sorting increases trust and completion triggers rewards.
frontend/src/game/minigames/DrawingMiniG: Lets players view Puro's drawings, tracking viewed items and adjusting trust accordingly.
frontend/src/game/minigames/HideAndSeekM: Hide-and-seek minigame with timed guessing, trust adjustments, and randomized hiding spots.
frontend/src/game/minigames/MiniGameLaun: Menu component that launches different minigames and handles closing and completion.
frontend/src/game/moments/MomentPlayer.t: Displays a narrative moment with title, scene text, and a close button.
frontend/src/game/moments/momentsData.ts: Defines moment metadata and scenes with trust requirements.
frontend/src/game/scene/HiveScene.tsx: Renders the hive scene with player movement, jump physics, procedural trees, enemy encounters, and transfur event handling.
frontend/src/game/scene/LibraryScene.tsx: Implements the library scene with movement, jump physics, camera control, texture loading, and proximity-based teleport triggering with Puro.
frontend/src/game/state/useGameStore.ts: Defines the global game state using Zustand, including trust, scenes, UI visibility, transfur logic, progress tracking, and related actions.
frontend/src/game/state/useSettingsStore: Stores and persists player settings such as aim sensitivity using Zustand.
frontend/src/game/story/endings.ts: Contains ending definitions and selects the correct ending based on trust thresholds.
frontend/src/game/story/EndingScene.tsx: Displays the final ending scene based on trust level and allows starting a new game or returning to the title.
frontend/src/game/ui/ActivityMenu.tsx: Shows available activities, applies trust changes, completes activities, unlocks moments, and closes the menu.
Manages library customization by placing discovered items and showing placed or available decorations.
frontend/src/game/ui/DialoguePanel.tsx: Dialogue UI that shows the current dialogue node, filters choices by trust level, and updates trust and navigation between nodes.
frontend/src/game/ui/LettersPanel.tsx: Panel for writing letters, sending them with validation, and viewing letter history with auto‑generated responses.
frontend/src/game/ui/MomentsMenu.tsx: Menu listing unlockable moments and allowing playback of unlocked moments using the MomentPlayer component.
frontend/src/game/ui/PauseMenu.tsx: Pause menu providing resume, navigation to submenus, settings, reset, and optional admin terminal access.
frontend/src/game/ui/SettingsScreen.tsx: Settings screen for adjusting audio volume, mute state, and aim sensitivity with a back button.
frontend/src/game/ui/TransfurOverlay.tsx: Timed fade‑in/out overlay showing a transfur message and calling onComplete after animation.
frontend/src/game/ui/TrustMeter.tsx: Displays trust level with label, color indicator, and progress bar based on current trust value.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching a backend actor tied to user identity and invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendAvailabilit: Hook checking backend availability via actor.isAvailable(), exposing status and refetch plus a standalone check helper.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, stored identity loading, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend game actions like fetching game state and performing mutations such as choices and activities.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base theme defining color variables, dark mode values, and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/startup.ts: Implements one‑time startup logic including storage checks, asset preloading, and state reset for testing.
frontend/src/state/useAdminGateStore.ts: Zustand store providing a simple username‑based local admin unlock gate with persistence.
Empty placeholder file for future server access state logic.
frontend/src/ui/AdminAccessPanel.tsx: UI panel for entering the admin username to unlock or lock admin mode with feedback messages.
frontend/src/ui/CreditsScreen.tsx: Displays game credits, about info, and a back button with a themed background.
frontend/src/ui/DiagnosticTerminalOverla: Renders an admin diagnostic terminal overlay with input handling, auto-scroll, command execution, and keyboard shortcuts.
frontend/src/ui/GameLaunchErrorScreen.ts: Displays a user-facing game launch error screen with retry options and expandable technical diagnostics.
frontend/src/ui/GameRuntimeErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches runtime errors during gameplay and shows an error card with optional stack details.
frontend/src/ui/ServerStatusIndicator.ts: Shows a small UI indicator reflecting backend server health status using colored icons and text.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/commands.ts: Implements a limited terminal command parser handling help, clear, diagnostics, and backend server status checks.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/useTerminalDiag: Formats diagnostic data into readable text lines for terminal display.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/useTerminalStor: Zustand store managing terminal state, input/output lines, and utility actions like open, close, and clear.
frontend/src/ui/TitleScreen.tsx: Main title screen UI with game start options, server status indicators, admin tools, and offline mode alerts.
frontend/src/utils/launchErrorNormalizat: Normalizes raw launch errors into user-friendly messages with categorized error types.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/STARTUP.md: Documentation describing the app startup workflow, initialization tasks, and how to extend the startup process.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: JSON snapshot of project state, features, and metadata for tracking development progress.
